One of the regular features of a British Government is that every so often the Prime Minister shuffles his Government i.e. moves Ministers around to other jobs, demotes/promotes/sacks as appropriate.
 
 One paper has indicated that the incompetent ministers will be got rid off. That then will be a first as not one minister from the Prime Minister down can be classified as even marginally competent. Wonder how a PM reshuffles himself!!
In this case "competance" translates as "arse-licking" rather than anything related to the job in hand, or filling in an expenses form...

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  British Government Reshuffle
